Testimonials

Tasty and nutritional drink

I’ve been looking to change up my drink regime to balance out vitamins and protein for complete nutrition. This Boost chocolate drink is delicious! I feel good drinking it knowing that I’m getting complete nutrition. The biggest shining star is the low sugar, which rounds out the drink. The taste is rich and the texture is smooth. If you’re looking for complete nutrition, grab a Boost. Getting my vitamins and minerals in, all while keeping protein up and sugar down is easy with this drink!
Brenda B.
